title: When will more Worlds Quest be added?
body: Just would like to know when I have had no more added since Friday I think

replies.body: are more world mission are coming or not?
It's likely to be weekly based, aligned with Worlds itself.  Hang tight, more will come!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=7lo24ftL,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-26T16:50:34.708+0000)
>
> It's likely to be weekly based, aligned with Worlds itself.  Hang tight, more will come!

Thank you. I was thinking I had to buy the ticket!
The Worlds mission pass will give additional missions for more tickets, but everyone still gets some free missions!
i have 35 worlds tokens and one quest. Complete 4 worlds quests 1/4. Is this the same for you?
